name: Uncontrollable Fall
description:
(WARNING: Flashing red lights, loud beeping noises)

Oh no! We're on an uncontrollable fall!

There's only 60 seconds to save every passenger before we hit the ground!

I'd better not leave the emergency exit open though, or we'll be plummeting even faster!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move, E to interact.

Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Made in less than a day, because I accidentally went full-on crunch mode in the first few hours.
